Section504DisabilityDescriptor.ShortDescription: A condition that affects a small number of people.
Section504DisabilityDescriptor.Description: A condition that affects a small number of people, often with limited information or treatment options.

Section504DisabilityDescriptor.ShortDescription: A condition characterized by inattention, hyperactivity, and impulsivity.
Section504DisabilityDescriptor.Description: A neurodevelopmental disorder characterized by inattention, hyperactivity, and impulsivity, which can make it difficult to focus, control impulses, and stay organized.

Section504DisabilityDescriptor.ShortDescription: A condition affecting communication, behavior, and social interaction.
Section504DisabilityDescriptor.Description: A developmental disorder affecting communication, behavior, and social interaction, often resulting in challenges with social skills, repetitive behaviors, and sensory sensitivities.

Section504DisabilityDescriptor.ShortDescription: A mental health condition characterized by extreme mood swings.
Section504DisabilityDescriptor.Description: A mental health condition characterized by extreme mood swings, including periods of mania and depression, which can significantly impact daily life.

Section504DisabilityDescriptor.ShortDescription: A disease caused by abnormal cell growth.
Section504DisabilityDescriptor.Description: A disease caused by abnormal cell growth, which can lead to tumors and other health problems.

Section504DisabilityDescriptor.ShortDescription: A physical disability affecting movement and coordination.
Section504DisabilityDescriptor.Description: A physical disability affecting movement and coordination, often caused by damage to the brain during development, resulting in varying levels of muscle weakness, spasticity, and difficulty with motor skills.

Section504DisabilityDescriptor.ShortDescription: A genetic condition affecting the lungs and other organs.
Section504DisabilityDescriptor.Description: A genetic disorder affecting the lungs and other organs, causing thick mucus buildup and leading to respiratory problems, digestive issues, and other health challenges.

Section504DisabilityDescriptor.ShortDescription: A complete or partial loss of hearing.
Section504DisabilityDescriptor.Description: A complete or partial loss of hearing, which can significantly impact communication and social interactions.

Section504DisabilityDescriptor.ShortDescription: A genetic condition causing intellectual and physical challenges.
Section504DisabilityDescriptor.Description: A genetic condition causing intellectual and physical challenges, including delayed development, cognitive impairments, and physical features such as a flat face, slanted eyes, and a small head.

Section504DisabilityDescriptor.ShortDescription: The harmful use of substances.
Section504DisabilityDescriptor.Description: The harmful use of substances, which can lead to addiction, health problems, and social consequences.

Section504DisabilityDescriptor.ShortDescription: Having both hearing and vision impairments.
Section504DisabilityDescriptor.Description: Having both hearing and vision impairments, which can present unique challenges in communication, mobility, and daily living.

Section504DisabilityDescriptor.ShortDescription: A learning disability that affects reading and writing.
Section504DisabilityDescriptor.Description: A learning disability that affects reading and writing, often characterized by difficulty recognizing words, decoding sounds, and understanding written language.

Section504DisabilityDescriptor.ShortDescription: A mental health condition affecting emotions and behavior.
Section504DisabilityDescriptor.Description: A mental health condition affecting emotions and behavior, which can include anxiety, depression, conduct disorders, and other emotional or behavioral difficulties.

Section504DisabilityDescriptor.ShortDescription: A neurological condition characterized by seizures.
Section504DisabilityDescriptor.Description: A neurological disorder characterized by seizures, which are sudden, uncontrolled electrical activity in the brain.

Section504DisabilityDescriptor.ShortDescription: A partial loss of hearing.
Section504DisabilityDescriptor.Description: A partial loss of hearing, which can affect communication and social interactions, particularly in noisy environments or when speaking at a distance.

Section504DisabilityDescriptor.ShortDescription: A cognitive impairment that affects learning and problem-solving.
Section504DisabilityDescriptor.Description: A cognitive impairment that affects learning and problem-solving, often characterized by limitations in intellectual functioning and adaptive behavior.

Section504DisabilityDescriptor.ShortDescription: A group of genetic conditions that cause muscle weakness.
Section504DisabilityDescriptor.Description: A group of genetic disorders that cause muscle weakness and wasting, leading to progressive loss of muscle function and mobility.

Section504DisabilityDescriptor.ShortDescription: A disability not listed.
Section504DisabilityDescriptor.Description: A disability not listed, which may include a variety of conditions that affect an individual's abilities or functioning.

Section504DisabilityDescriptor.ShortDescription: A learning condition affecting a specific academic skill.
Section504DisabilityDescriptor.Description: A learning disorder affecting a specific academic skill, such as reading, writing, or math, which can make it difficult to learn and achieve academic success.

Section504DisabilityDescriptor.ShortDescription: A birth condition affecting the spinal cord.
Section504DisabilityDescriptor.Description: A birth defect affecting the spinal cord, which can cause paralysis, sensory loss, and other health problems.

Section504DisabilityDescriptor.ShortDescription: An injury to the brain caused by a sudden blow to the head.
Section504DisabilityDescriptor.Description: An injury to the brain caused by a sudden blow to the head, which can result in a wide range of physical, cognitive, emotional, and behavioral impairments.

Section504DisabilityDescriptor.ShortDescription: A partial or complete loss of vision.
Section504DisabilityDescriptor.Description: A partial or complete loss of vision, which can affect daily activities, communication, and mobility.
